name: Nagasaki Kitty
description:
Nagasaki Kitty is an educational game based on historical research designed to better inform Western audiences about the atomic bombs. 

For more information and updates please like and follow on social media

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/NagasakiKitty

Twitter: https://twitter.com/nagasaki_kitty

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/nagasaki_kitty/
